page.title: 19Ways of Worshipping
page.content: School Assemblies are taken by the head teacher, Mr. Meades. We have two hymns, a prayer and a story about Jesus or characters from the Old Testament. Sometimes we hear about a famous person who is remembered for some good deed. Each Friday a different class takes it in turn to give an assembly. I do not go into Assembly because I am a Jehovah's Witness. Instead my Mom or Dad comes into school to take our group of eight. We read out of our ublication 'My Book of Bible Stories'. Some evenings and weekends I go out calling on people with my parents. The school choir sometimes gives services around the different churches and at school. We sing songs about various bible stories, and carols at hristmas. We performed 'Jerusalem Joy' t Easter and we have also done 'Jonah Man Jazz' about Jonah and the whale.
